Copyright 2018-2019 Edipo Souza

This software is provided as an open source project, free to use and share. Lotus Tracker collects user information about the Magic the Gathering Arena card game, such as user collection, wildcards, decks and matches.

Lotus Tracker will not share any user data, but anonymous match data may be used for statistics purposes.

Permission is granted to anyone for non-commercial use of this software. The code is free for study and contribution, but not allowed to be altered and redistributed as another application for MtgArena.
